column4: 2020 at 7:15 am on National Road 3 in Prey Nop district
column6: there was an accident between a white HYUNDAI vehicle wearing a license plate number 3D-5097. The unidentified driver displayed an extreme lack of caution
column7: and crossed the tracks while there was a train heading from Phnom Penh to Sihanoukville.------The train collided
column8: then the train continued. The accidents did not cause any injuries
column9: and the truck was taken to Prey Nop police station. The driver of the car went missing after the crash. KPSBN
